name: IDNucleus
body:
### IDNucleus. ForgeRock Identity Management made easy.
IDnucleus simplifies the installation of ForgeRock identity management products to provide a fully managed SaaS solution for your Identity and Access Management.

### Who we are
We are providers of an Identity as a Service cloud, using the ForgeRock product set. We can provide you with an out of the box product set, ready to go quickly and with the minimal of ForgeRock technical skill required from your organisation.

The founders of IDNucleus have helped customers to implement their own identity solutions and have seen that customers spend time and money to implement the same solutions. We saw the opportunity to provide a standardised environment, that can work at cloud scale to provide a secure and cost effective solution.

### About IDNucleus
We're currently in a beta phase with the IDNucleus service, so if you're interested in trialling the product then get in touch.

### Contact Us
You can get in contact with us using this form.
